name: Bunny Triggered
title: Amber: Bunny Triggered
inPlayDescription: After your Amber, who has this card equipped, uses a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack: If this card and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Baron Bunny are still on the field, then <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Baron Bunny explodes and deals 4 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Amber to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Amber, equip this card.After Amber equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Explosive Puppet once.After you use a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack: If this card and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Baron Bunny are still on the field, then <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Baron Bunny explodes and deals 4 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG.(You must have Amber in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
